title: Activity-Centered Mathematics Learning Design: Project-Based Educational Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational math concepts and experience applying them to tasks
context.additional_context: Mathematics re-education program for working professionals, emphasizing project-based problem-solving for real work challenges and collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently design math projects using the four stages of the ACAD framework (Analysis-Design-Implementation-Evaluation).
Learners can creatively solve mathematical problems encountered in real-world work environments through team-based projects.
Learners can visually represent and share project results using digital tools (Google Docs, Excel, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
